name: The Island Tower
description:
Requires a HTC Vive headset and SteamVR

The Island Tower is a procedurally-generated virtual reality dungeon crawler for the HTC Vive. You are alone on an island with a tower, with no recollection of how you got there or why you are there. When you enter the tower, you find a sword and a wand. While climbing the tower, you are attacked by skeletons. How far can you make it?
